Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.16 Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika » 1.16.1 Maggārammaṇapada » 1.16.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika
Maggārammaṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
459.
1005Hetu maggārammaṇo dhammo hetussa maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
460.
1006Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1007Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1008Nahetupaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1009(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.16.2 Maggahetukapada >>
